title: Pakistan faces second straight loss in Socca World Cup
text:
Pakistan was marred with yet another blow in the second Socca World Cup as Romania beat them by 5-0 in Group H contest on Tuesday.

Mohammad Ali of Pakistan conceded an own goal which was then followed by immense pressure on the green shirts. Romanians played aggressively and down the men in green in later half of the match.

With this win, Romania reached on top in Group ‘H’ with four points followed by Slovenia and Hungary with three points each. Pakistan is placed last with zero points.

description: Pakistan was marred with yet another blow in the second Socca World Cup as Romania beat the green shirt by 5-0 in Group H contest on Tuesday.
